channel.title: Parallel on Vienna R User Group
channel.description: Recent content in Parallel on Vienna R User Group

item.title: Meetup 2019-05-14
item.description: Easy peasy massive parallel computing in R (Mikkel) Mikkel a member and Co-Organizer of CopenhagenR paid a short visit to Vienna and before heading to Ennio Moricones (Vienna) concert he showed us around on the functionality of the ‘future’ and ‘furrr’ R packages. These provide a framework that make it possible to write code, that works seamlessly on a laptop or on a supercomputer. His R-talk showed us how.
